title: Censorship

title: Facebook algorithms get everything wrong
text: I‚Äôve been posting some gently used furniture and including that it‚Äôs from a pet friendly home to avoid selling to someone with allergies over the years I‚Äôve repeatedly been flagged and threatened by them. and again recently just a few days ago I posted a nice clean couch that had been in a pet friendly home yet again I get this stupid message saying I am selling animals and I will be blocked ghosted or removed from access to marketplace. I have repeatedly tried to get in touch with Facebook to help them understand this is a couch not a dog that I‚Äôm selling no one responds to me and my permanent record on Facebook marketplace is blighted not because I was doing anything wrong but because Facebook doesn‚Äôt bother helping me and their algorithms are 100% wrong 100% of the time. I‚Äôve also been accused of bullying when I barely said anything and send me messages saying I violated community standards Facebook should hire actual human beings to investigate these claims rather than just letting computer-generated robot throw accusations out at people with no research whatsoever.

title: What was !
text:
Face book was a place we enjoyed believing we had privacy . That this app was actually family friendly and shared with mutual interest. Yet we are censored and stopped from free thoughts and words . What standards are we subjected to so many issued that are not what our lives are about.
I can not friend my family because photos are used . I hope face book becomes more welcoming and open to all ideas and free speech ! Thank you!

title: Data collection
text: This platform is nothing more than a collection of data on you. Yeah yeah, you may or may not have something to hide. But what happens when your account gets hacked? You have to start all over. title: Dead Internet Theory
text:
